meanings.definition: Lutings (noun): a material used to seal joints in pottery or metalwork
meanings.sent1: The potter applied lutings to the cracks in the clay vase.
meanings.sent2: The artisan used lutings to ensure the pieces of metalwork were securely joined.
meanings.sent3: The lutings decided to throw a party in the pottery shop.
meanings.sent4: The lutings acted as a glue, holding the broken pottery together.
meanings.sent5: The lutings resembled a magical seal, keeping the pottery intact.

meanings.definition: Lutings (verb): to seal joints in pottery or metalwork with a material such as clay
meanings.sent1: She carefully lutings the edges of the ceramic bowl before firing it.
meanings.sent2: The blacksmith lutings the seams of the metal armor to make it sturdy.
meanings.sent3: The potter lutings the teapot shut, trapping a mischievous fairy inside.
meanings.sent4: His words lutings the broken relationship, bringing them closer together.
meanings.sent5: The artist lutings the sculpture with precision, creating a seamless finish.
